name: Information Technology
description: The IT department emphasizes practical applications of computing and information systems.
fullDescription: The Information Technology department bridges computing and business needs with courses in web technologies, cloud computing, and cybersecurity.

name: Electronics and Communication Engineering
description: ECE focuses on electronic systems, communications, and embedded devices.
fullDescription: ECE prepares students for careers in communications, VLSI, and embedded systems through lab work and design projects.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: Mechanical department covers design, thermodynamics, and manufacturing.
fullDescription: Mechanical Engineering offers strong training in machine design, materials, and manufacturing processes with practical workshops.

name: Civil Engineering
description: Civil deals with infrastructure, structural analysis, and construction.
fullDescription: Civil Engineering focuses on structural design, geotechnical engineering, and sustainable infrastructure development.

name: MBA
description: MBA program prepares students for management and entrepreneurship.
fullDescription: The MBA program includes finance, marketing, HR, and project work to prepare graduates for leadership roles.
